verses.verse: Thou <S%G4771><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> <S%G5043><s%> My Child, <S%G3450><s%> Be Strong <S%G1743><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The Things Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Didst Hear <S%G191><s%> ' Of <S%G3844><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> With <S%G1223><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> Commit <S%G3908><s%> To Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Such As <S%G3748><s%> Competent <S%G2425><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Others <S%G2087><s%> To Teach. <S%G1321><s%>
Thou <S%G4771><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> , Suffer Hardship <S%G2553><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> A Soldier <S%G4757><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

No One <S%G3762><s%> Serving As A Soldier <S%G4754><s%> Entangles Himself <S%G1707><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life <S%G979><s%> Affairs, <S%G4230><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Enrolled Him As A Soldier <S%G4758><s%> He May Please. <S%G700><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Contend In The Games <S%G118><s%> Anyone, <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not Crowned <S%G4737><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> Lawfully <S%G3545><s%> He Shall Have Contended. <S%G118><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Labour <S%G2872><s%> Husbandman <S%G1092><s%> Must <S%G1163><s%> Before <S%G4412><s%> <S%G4413><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fruits <S%G2590><s%> Partaking. <S%G3335><s%>

Consider <S%G3539><s%> The Things <S%G3739><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> May Give <S%G1325><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Understanding <S%G4907><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Raised <S%G1453><s%> From Among <S%G1537><s%> The Dead, <S%G3498><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> , Of David, <S%G1138><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Suffer Hardship <S%G2553><s%> Unto <S%G3360><s%> Bonds <S%G1199><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> An Evil Doer : <S%G2557><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Bound. <S%G1210><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> I Endure <S%G5278><s%> For Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elect, <S%G1588><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> They The <S%G846><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> May Obtain <S%G5177><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>
Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Is The <S%G3588><s%> Word; <S%G3056><s%> <S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> We Died Together With Him, <S%G4880><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Shall Live Together; <S%G4800><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> We Endure, <S%G5278><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Shall Reign Together; <S%G4821><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> , We Deny <S%G720><s%> Him, He Also <S%G2548><s%> Will Deny <S%G720><s%> Us; <S%G2248><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> We Are Unfaithful, <S%G569><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Abides; <S%G3306><s%> To Deny <S%G720><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not Able. <S%G1410><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> Put In Remembrance Of, <S%G5279><s%> Testifying Earnestly <S%G1263><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Dispute About Words <S%G3054><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Profitable, <S%G5539><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> Subversion <S%G2692><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Hear. <S%G191><s%>

Be Diligent <S%G4704><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> Approved <S%G1384><s%> To Present <S%G3936><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God, <S%G2316><s%> A Workman <S%G2040><s%> Not Ashamed, <S%G422><s%> Straightly Cutting <S%G3718><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Truth; <S%G225><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Profane <S%G952><s%> Empty Babblings <S%G2757><s%> Stand Aloof From, <S%G4026><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> They Will Advance <S%G4298><s%> Of Ungodliness, <S%G763><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Their Word <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Gangrene <S%G1044><s%> Pasture <S%G3542><s%> Will Have; <S%G2192><s%> Of Whom <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Philetus; <S%G5372><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Missed The Mark, <S%G795><s%> Asserting <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> To Have Taken Place; <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Are Overthrowing <S%G396><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of Some <S%G5100><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Nevertheless <S%G3305><s%> Firm <S%G4731><s%> Foundation <S%G2310><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> <S%G2476><s%> <S%G2476><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4973><s%> This Seal, <S%G3778><s%> Knows <S%G1097><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Depart <S%G868><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Names <S%G3687><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> A House <S%G3614><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Are Not <S%G2076><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> Vessels <S%G4632><s%> Golden <S%G5552><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Silver, <S%G693><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Wooden <S%G3585><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Earthen, <S%G3749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Honour, <S%G5092><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Others <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Dishonour <S%G819><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> Shall Have Purged <S%G1571><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> From <S%G575><s%> These, <S%G5130><s%> He Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> A Vessel <S%G4632><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Honour, <S%G5092><s%> Having Been Sanctified, <S%G37><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Serviceable <S%G2173><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Master, <S%G1203><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Having Been Prepared. <S%G2090><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Youthful <S%G3512><s%> Lusts <S%G1939><s%> Flee, <S%G5343><s%> <S%G1377><s%> And Pursue <S%G1161><s%> Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Call On <S%G1941><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Pure <S%G2513><s%> A Heart. <S%G2588><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But Foolish <S%G3474><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Undisciplined <S%G521><s%> Questionings <S%G2214><s%> Refuse, <S%G3868><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Beget <S%G1080><s%> Contentions. <S%G3163><s%>

<S%G1401><s%> And A Bondman <S%G1161><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Behooves Not <S%G1163><s%> To Contend, <S%G3164><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Gentle <S%G2261><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> All; <S%G3956><s%> Apt To Teach; <S%G1317><s%> Forbearing; <S%G420><s%>
